metadata.description: Director Walt Becker (Van Wilder, Wild Hogs) comes to BOOM! in a big way with his sci-fi/fantasty tale of knights in a post-apocalyptic future! The world has been twisted into a rusting and forgotten dystopia - and a new type of knight rises from the ashes to make order out of chaos! Scripted by Michael Alan Nelson, the fan-favorite writer of Fall of Cthulhu. Cover by top Warhammer talent Karl Richardson!
metadata.name: Last Reign: Kings of War, Vol. 1
